HDG.ID.content: perdurance of that which grounds & is grounded not only holds the 2 apart [Being & beings], holds them facing each other, holds them in tension, so that Being grounds beings & beings ground Being (in their way) [Being needs being, tautology?]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
